The post Brazuca Play Kodi Addon | Install & Use appeared first on ProoFFreader.
content:encoded:
Brazuca Play is a video addon that streams Brazilian content such as TV shows, movies, sports, music, and much more. In addition, the addon comes in the Portuguese language making it popular among users in Portuguese-speaking regions. 

Brazuca Play is compatible with Kodi 18 Leia and 19 Matrix.

Brazuca Play has a simple user interface with categories such as movies, TV shows, and soap operas.

Brazuca Play addon sections

The sections in this addon include:

  • TV Ao Vivo
  • Filmes
  • Series
  • Desenhos
  • Animes
  • Novelas
  • Configuracoes

Brazuca Play Addon Installation Prerequisites

You can find this addon in the Vikings repository. But before installing Brazuca Play, you’ll need to change Kodi settings to allow installation from unknown sources.

Brazuca Play Addon Information

  1. Name of the addon: Brazuca Play
  2. Repository name: Vikings Repositorio
  3. Category: Media sources
  4. Media source name: vkodi
  5. Latest working URL: http://vkodi.net/repo/
How Not To F*ck Up Your Kodi Experience: Streaming movies and TV shows on any of the 3rd party Kodi-addons may be illegal in your country due to copyright issues. 

Consider using a VPN if you truly care about protecting your online privacy.

Here are the key benefits of hiding your IP (using VPN):

1) Encrypts your internet traffic.
2) You can access Geo-restricted content.
3) You can avoid ISP throttling.
4) You can avoid unwanted surveillance by government agencies and ISPs.
5) You can protect yourself from hackers.

Connect VPN on all of your streaming devices (iOS, Windows, Android, Amazon Fire TV, etc.) and enjoy worry-free & high-speed movie experience 24/7.

The Most Popular VPN Providers Among Kodi Users Are:

1) Get CyberGhost - 45-Day Money-Back Guarantee
2) Get ExpressVPN - 30-Day Money-Back Guarantee
3) Get PrivateVPN - 30-Day Money-Back Guarantee

Installation Guide

First Things First – Enable Installation From Unknown Sources

Go to Home Screen, click on the gear icon, click on system, select “add-ons” on the left side menu, allow installation from “Unknown Sources”, click “yes” when the warning popup appears. 

Installing Vikings Repositorio

  1. Go to Home Screen, click on Gear Icon, click on File Manager;
  2. Click Add Source, Click None, Type in the URL “http://vkodi.net/repo” and click Done;
  3. Pick a name for the repository (i.e. vKODI) and enter it in the bottom box and click OK;
  4. Click back until you are in the Main Menu, select Addons on the left side; 
  5. Click on the Box Symbol (top left corner), Choose Install From ZIP file, click Yes when a warning appears;
  6. Open “vKODI” Source and choose this file: “repository.vikings.zip”
  7. A notification saying “Installed Successfully” will appear.

Installing Brazuca Play Kodi Addon

  1. Go to Home Screen, find Add-ons on the left side, select the box symbol (top left corner) to get to the Addon Browser;
  2. Click on Install From Repository, choose Vikings Repositorio, click on Video Addons in the category section;
  3. Click on Brazuca Play and hit install, select OK to confirm the installation of dependencies (don’t appear in Kodi 19 Matrix);
  4. A notification saying “Installed Successfully” will appear;
  5. You can now access the Brazuca Play addon from the main menu. 

Compatibility

Brazuca Play is compatible with Kodi 18 Leia and 19 Matrix. In addition, the addon works perfectly with several devices, including Amazon Fire Stick, Fire TV Stick, and Apple TV.

Alternative Addons

Is Brazuca Play not what you’re looking for? Here are some great alternatives: 

Zeus delivers high-quality movies, TV shows, music, and sports in English, Portuguese and other languages. It is compatible with Kodi 18 Leia and 19 Matrix.

Apollo lets you stream movies and TV shows in Portuguese. It is compatible with Kodi 18 Leia and 19 Matrix.

One Play is a video addon from the Vikings repo, offering streaming links for movies, TV shows, soap operas, animation, and much more in Portuguese. One Play is compatible with Kodi 18 Leia and 19 Matrix.

Common Issues With Brazuca Play Addon

Here are some common problems with the Brazuca Pay addon and their solutions. 

Brazuca Play Addon Shows a ‘No Stream Available’ Error

Kodi depends on scrapers to fetch streaming links from the internet. When the scrapers fail to fetch the links due to any reason, Kodi displays the ‘No Stream Available’ error.

Here are probable reasons for this kind of error: 

  • The content you seek is unavailable on the internet.
  • Your Brazuca Play addon is incompatible with the Kodi version.
  • Buildup of cache.
  • Poor internet connection.
  • The available links come from restricted sites.
  • Some Kodi providers are disabled.

Probable solutions to this error include: 

Clear cache

Streaming content on Kodi for a long time without clearing browser cache and data history can slow down the application. When the app slows down, it affects the addon’s performance, resulting in the ‘No Stream Available’ error.

Clear the cache to refresh the app and the addon. You can do this from the Settings menu on the addon, denoted as Configuracoes in Portuguese. 

Navigate to the Clear Cache option and press OK.

You can also use Kodi maintenance tools to clear cache across all your Kodi-connected devices. Some examples of such tools include Open Wizard, Aliunde Maintenance Wizard, and SG wizard.

Use a VPN 

A VPN allows you to bypass geo-restrictions and firewalls to access content from certain sites. If you suspect your Internet Service Provider has created firewalls to block access to certain sites, connect to a premium VPN to circumvent these restrictions. 

Fix Faulty Internet Connection

A broken internet connection causes several errors when streaming content on Brazuca Play. Among them is the ‘No Stream Available’ error when the connection between Kodi servers and internet servers is lost.

Here’s how to resolve a faulty internet connection:

  • Turn off the router for a few minutes, then restart. 
  • Force close your modem, remove the service card, reinsert it, and then turn the modem back on. 

Update the Addon

You may also encounter the ‘No Stream Available’ error due to incompatibility between the Brazuca Play version and the Kodi version. Update the addon to the latest version and check if that fixes the issue.

Enable All Providers

Most related addons use common providers to pull streaming links from the internet. For instance, addons located in the same repository will share some of the providers. If any of the shared providers are disabled, you may receive the ‘No Stream Available’ error message.

Follow these steps to enable all providers:

  • Disable all providers.
  • Restart Kodi app.
  • Enable all the providers afresh.
  • Restart the addon. 

If the above solutions do not resolve the error, then the content you are searching for may be unavailable on the internet.

Brazuca Play Addon Fails To Launch

Here’s why the Brazuca Play addon might fail to launch. 

Accumulation of Cache

A buildup of cache can slow down the Brazuca Play addon. Too much cache can also make the addon fail to launch or launch then stops unexpectedly. For best results, clear your cache and see if that fixes the issue.

Incorrect Proxy Settings

The Brazuca Kodi addon works seamlessly when the Kodi device’s proxy settings match those of the network. These settings include the port number and proxy servers. One of the causes of deviation of these credentials is signing in to Kodi with a new device.

Using a different internet connection, such as a friend’s or hotel’s Wi-Fi, can also cause a mismatch of these proxy settings.

To resolve the proxy deviation problem, check to confirm your device’s port number and proxy server matches your network’s.

Brazuca Play Addon Shows the ‘Check the Log for More Information’ Error

When you notice the ‘Check the Log for More Information’ error, it may derive from the following: 

  • The Brazuca Play addon is out of date.
  • Buildup of cache.
  • Faulty internet connection.

However, to fix this issue, 

  • Clear all cache.
  • Troubleshoot your network.
  • Update the Brazuca Play addon to the latest version

.

Brazuca Play Addon Fails To Play Links or Requires Authorization

Failure to play links is one of the common issues reported by Brazuca Play users. This error may emanate from the following: 

Playback Settings Set To Autoplay

When you set your playback settings to auto-play, the streaming links play in chronological order. In case the top link is broken or invalid, it won’t play. 

The source select playback settings, on the other hand, let you choose only the best links. The latter reduces the instances of links failing to play by allowing you to hand-pick valid links.

Faulty URLResolver

The URL resolver checks the most suitable links from the many links found on the internet when you search for content on Kodi. If this feature is broken, you may receive invalid links which won’t play. 

You Have Signed In to Kodi on a New Device

When you synchronize your Kodi-connected devices, hoster sites automatically pair with the devices. Logging in to Kodi with a new device may result in the ‘To Play This Video, Authorization Is Required’ error.

To resolve the above issue, try the following options:

  • Troubleshoot your URLResolver.
  • Switch your playback settings to source select.
  • Use a static IP address. This type of IP allows the automatic pairing of your devices to hoster sites, eliminating the need for authorization.

Brazuca Play Addon Shows ‘The Dependencies Could Not Be Satisfied’ Error

You may encounter the ‘Dependencies Could Not Be Satisfied’ error when installing the Brazuca Play addon. When this happens, it’s usually due to a python code incompatibility between the addon version and the Kodi version.

Given that developers are constantly updating their addons to match the requirements of the latest Kodi version, incompatibility issues may arise if you use a newer addon version with an older Kodi version.

To resolve this problem, uninstall the old Kodi version and install the latest. 

Frequently Asked Questions Brazuca Play Kodi Addon 

Is the Brazuca Play Kodi Addon Legal?

Yes, Brazuca Kodi provides legal content that is readily available in the public domain.

Is the Brazuca Play Kodi Addon Free?

Yes, the Brazuca Play addon provides free streaming links.

Do I Need a VPN With the Brazuca Play Kodi Addon?

Though not mandatory, using a VPN lets you browse content privately, access geo-restricted sites, and reduce bandwidth by 50%. 

Does the Brazuca Play Kodi Addon Still Work in 2021?

Yes, it does.

Conclusion

To sum up, Brazuca Play is a video addon popular for providing movies, TV shows, animations, sports, and soap operas in the Portuguese language. It is found in Viking’s repository and offers free and high-quality streaming links, making it a fan-favorite among Portuguese-speaking users. In addition, this addon is compatible with the latest Kodi version.
